com.ge.fdh.asset.helper

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ge.fdh.asset.helper.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends Object
    This class provides public utilities for accessing and reading file on the file system.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(String filename,
                             String text,
                             boolean create)
                      throws IOException
        Write a text file
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename (full path) to be written to
        text - the text to be written
        create - if true, the directory and any sub-directories where the file resides are created, otherwise the directory must exist first
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the file

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(String filename,
                             String text,
                             boolean create,
                             boolean append)
                      throws IOException
        Write a text file
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename (full path) to be written to
        text - the text to be written
        create - if true, the directory and any sub-directories where the file resides are created, otherwise the directory must exist first
        append - if true, the text will be written to the end of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the file

                                                           String expectedResultFile)
                                                    throws IOException
        compare a result String to the contents of the expected result file. Return true if each line in the expected result file is contained in result string. Order doesn't matter.
        Parameters:
        inResultString - string produce by a test
        expectedResultFile - expected result saved in file
        Returns:
        true if comparison was successful
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws IOException
